about.title: About Me
about.description: Full-Stack Developer with {years} years of experience in educational and business management software and apps. Experienced in reducing project costs, optimizing development processes, and implementing solutions that increase efficiency and quality of deliveries.

highlights.title: Performance
highlights.description: Focus on optimization and user experience

list.title: Coap
list.description: Visual drag-and-drop platform for creating interactive educational materials, similar to Canva but focused on education.

list.title: CustomDeploy
list.description: Complete solution for automating deployments of web applications and APIs hosted on IIS, with .NET 8 backend and React + TypeScript frontend.

list.title: AspNetCoreApiBase
list.description: Starter template for REST APIs in ASP.NET Core 8.0 with JWT authentication, Docker, Entity Framework and 40+ tests. Complete structure ready for new projects.

list.title: Redux Visualizer
list.description: React modal component to inspect and edit Redux states in real-time. Displays state as interactive tree with complete support for editing values of any type.

list.title: GraphQLAPI
list.description: Modern and flexible .NET API focused exclusively on GraphQL, using HotChocolate and Entity Framework Core. Modular structure with SQLite and production-ready.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll do my best to get back to you!
